titleStmt.title: The reuengers tragædie As it hath beene sundry times acted, by the Kings Maiesties Seruants.
titleStmt.author: Tourneur, Cyril, 1575?-1626, attributed name.
Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, and are to be sold at his house in Fleete-lane at the signe of the Printers-Presse,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Thomas Middleton and to Cyril Tourneur.
A variant of the edition dated 1608.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
